posts.post_content:
[url]http://www.youtube.com/v/hWAVp990pKQ[/url]

WTB: 1911 Obak Swain (Last card needed)
One of my current card collecting projects has been compiling an Obak sub-set of Vancouver and Victoria players. Goodwin just auctioned a slew of Obaks and I picked up four or five of the last cards I needed but I screwed up and bid on the 1910 Swain instead of the 1911 card. It now remains the last card I need to finish. If you won the 1911 Swain or if you have one you would consider sending my way, please let me know. I have an extra 1910 Swain, other trade bait, American cash money and lotsa good karma so I'm sure a favorable deal can be struck.

Wow, David!  Those are beautiful cards!  When I get to Hawaii again, I would love to see them!
From afar, they look pure and chaste.

David I thoroughly enjoyed looking through your set. Outstanding!!
Good luck on finding the missing piece for completion........
